info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 11 at 6:16PM CDT until July 11 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Quad Cities IA IL
info.description:
...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHERN SCOTT AND ROCK ISLAND COUNTIES...
At 616 PM CDT, Local law enforcement reported many roads flooded in and near Davenport, including main thoroughfares, as well as first floors of buildings starting to flood quickly. Between 1.5 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2.5 inches are possible in the warned area.
This is a FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY for Davenport. This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW!
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Law enforcement reported.
IMPACT...This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW! Life threatening flash flooding of low water crossings, small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Davenport, Moline, Rock Island, Bettendorf, East Moline, Silvis, Le Claire, Hampton, Port Byron, Blue Grass, Buffalo, Rapids City, Riverdale, Panorama Park, Rock Island Arsenal, Mississippi Valley Fairgrounds, Credit Island, West Lake Park, Campbells Island and Pleasant Valley.
info.instruction:
Move to higher ground now! This is an extremely dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY this area til 9:00 PM CDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY is in effect for this area until 9:00 PM CDT. This is an extremely dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

parameter.value: SNM: EMERGENCIA DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 9:00 PM CDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: EMERGENCIA DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 9:00 PM CDT. Esta es una situacion extremadamente peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
